class.name: PaddingContainer

theme_items.theme_item: All direct children of [PaddingContainer] will have a bottom padding of [code]padding_bottom[/code] pixels.
All direct children of [PaddingContainer] will have a left padding of [code]padding_left[/code] pixels.
All direct children of [PaddingContainer] will have a right padding of [code]padding_right[/code] pixels.
All direct children of [PaddingContainer] will have a top padding of [code]padding_top[/code] pixels.
